subject: Tennis
Italian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Sara Errani became the first native player to reach the Italian Open final in nearly 30 years with a 6-3, 7-5 win over the sixth-seeded Jelena Jankovic on Saturday.
snippet: Sara Errani became the first native player to reach the Italian Open final in nearly 30 years with a 6-3, 7-5 win over the sixth-seeded Jelena Jankovic on Saturday.
